actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States limiting the number of consecutive terms members of the United States Senate and House of Representatives may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits Members of the House of Representatives to six consecutive terms and Members of the Senate to two consecutive terms.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States limiting the number of consecutive terms members of the United States Senate and House of Representatives may serve.
